item.title: APA Corp 10-K
item.description: APA Corp, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 23, 2023 had 48551 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1345 instances 2022 - 519 instances million - 385 instances 1 - 384 instances gas - 378 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
